fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: Launch an SOS flare at your house to call for help.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: All Protective roles will be redirected to you, they will be aware they were redirected but not who they were redirected to. If no Protective roles exist/are alive, gain Powerful defense. You have 3 SOS flares.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Survive until the end of the game, and get saved by using an SOS flare at least once.
